      • withOptimizedClasses

        public BlueCollectionOnDiskBuilder<K,T> withOptimizedClasses(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends java.io.Serializable>> classesToRegister)
        Description copied from interface: BlueCollectionBuilder
        Registers classesToRegister with the serializer to make serialization and deserialization faster and more compact, then returns itself.
        Specified by:
        withOptimizedClasses in interface BlueCollectionBuilder<K extends BlueKey,T extends java.io.Serializable>
        Parameters:
        classesToRegister - classes that will be stored as values, in values, or in keys inside this collection.
        Returns:

      • withSegmentSize

        public BlueCollectionOnDiskBuilder<K,T> withSegmentSize(SegmentSize<K> segmentSize)
                                                 throws BlueDbException
        Description copied from interface: BlueCollectionBuilder
        Requests a specific segment size to use for the collection. Values of the collection are grouped into segments and values in a segment can be vacuumed into a single file. Therefore, segment size will affect how fast you can access a specific value in a segment and how many i-nodes (files and directories) the collection will use on disk. This will be ignored if the collection already exists. In the future BlueDB might support migrating from one segment size to another.
        Specified by:
        withSegmentSize in interface BlueCollectionBuilder<K extends BlueKey,T extends java.io.Serializable>
        Parameters:
        segmentSize - the requested segment size for the collection. Values of the collection are grouped into segments and values in a segment can be vacuumed into a single file. Therefore, segment size will affect how fast you can access a specific value in a segment and how many i-nodes (files and directories) the collection will use on disk. This will be ignored if the collection already exists. In the future BlueDB might support migrating from one segment size to another.
        Returns:
        itself, after segmentSize is added as the requested segment size
        Throws:
        BlueDbException - if the requested segment size is invalid

      • build

        public BlueCollectionOnDisk<T> build()
                              throws BlueDbException
        Specified by:
        build in interface BlueCollectionBuilder<K extends BlueKey,T extends java.io.Serializable>
        Returns:
        the existing BlueCollection or else builds a new one if none exists
        Throws:
        BlueDbException - if any problems are encountered, such as the collection already existing with a different type
